title: Top Floor 2BR,Carpet Flr,Pantry,Sh Laundry/Yard(780 Guerrero #12)
posting_body: Top, third floor 2-1BR/1BA apartment in the Mission Dolores.
Floors are carpeted except in kitchen, pantry and bath.
Deep living room has a bay window and a huge walk-in closet.
It could easily be used as a second bedroom.
Large kitchen includes gas stove and has space for a small dining arrangement.
Pantry is in a passage that connects the kitchen to the living room.
Central hallway has built-in drawers and cabinets as well as a closet at the unit's entrance.
Bedroom has a walk-in closet and is separated from the living room with sliding wood doors.
Shared yard is concrete with bike rack and potted plants.
Building has laundry room with coin operated washer and dryer.
Building is on Guerrero, four blocks equidistant from the shopping and dining districts on 16th and 24th Streets.
Many neighborhood cafés and shops in the immediate area.
It's just one block to the south end of Dolores Park.
Walk Score is 97, Transit Score is 92.
Lots of transportation options within easy walking distance include 16th and 24th Street BART stations, J-Church MUNI, and bus lines 14, 22, 33, 49.
Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.
Leasing and Real Estate: Our Family Business for Over 100 Years.

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
